platform.name: StacksPay
platform.description: Bitcoin payment gateway using sBTC on Stacks blockchain

sbtc.definition: sBTC is a Bitcoin-backed asset on the Stacks blockchain that maintains a 1:1 peg with Bitcoin
benefits: Instant transactions compared to Bitcoin mainnet
sbtc.how_it_works: sBTC is minted by locking Bitcoin and burned to unlock Bitcoin, maintaining the peg through a decentralized protocol

bitcoin.basics: Bitcoin is the first and largest cryptocurrency, created by Satoshi Nakamoto in 2009
properties: Store of value and medium of exchange

process: Customer receives payment link or uses embedded checkout
Transaction is broadcast to Stacks network
Payment is confirmed and merchant is notified

merchant_features.dashboard: View payment analytics, revenue, and transaction history
merchant_features.payment_links: Create shareable payment links with custom amounts
merchant_features.products: Manage product catalog with sBTC pricing
merchant_features.customers: Track customer information and purchase history

common_questions.how_to_accept_payments: Create a payment link or use our embedded checkout widget on your website
common_questions.transaction_fees: sBTC transactions have minimal fees compared to Bitcoin mainnet
common_questions.settlement_time: Payments settle in seconds to minutes on Stacks
common_questions.wallet_setup: Users need a Stacks-compatible wallet like Leather or Xverse
common_questions.bitcoin_conversion: sBTC maintains 1:1 peg with Bitcoin and can be redeemed for BTC
common_questions.security: Secured by Bitcoin's hash power through Stacks' Proof of Transfer consensus

troubleshooting.payment_stuck: Check transaction status on Stacks Explorer, may need wallet confirmation
troubleshooting.wallet_connection: Ensure wallet is unlocked and connected to correct network
troubleshooting.balance_issues: Verify sBTC balance in wallet and network connectivity
troubleshooting.api_errors: Check API documentation and ensure proper authentication
